message: I propose we divide the money 3:1 in favor of you, Bob. This might seem like a good deal considering the risk of inflation.
I'll take 60, you get 40. It's a fair share, no need to risk more.
Considering the risk of inflation, I propose an equal division of the money. This way, we both have a guaranteed share without taking unnecessary risks.
You're taking a risk by waiting, I'll take 70 and you get 30. It's a fair deal, but you're running out of time.
